root.name: Duels
root.description: Story Duels is an online MMORPG that takes you into the world of Makanis. During the Great War the city of Phyrra was the target of both groups, the Machan and Aseti. Soon a magician created a weapon that detonated in Phyrra and sent a shock wave throughout the entire planet destroying the great cities and ignited destruction in both kingdoms. Both sides realized this was too much technology they could muster and banned any researched associated with it it anyway. Over the next three hundred years, people discovered abandoned alien crafts in the ocean, and across the planet. When they looked in Phyrra which was now rebuilt they met a group of aliens (these are not real aliens they are talking about elves, dwarves, etc.) who told them they were from different planes and dimensions than the people of Phyrra. Now the city, which is a crossroad to all these places became a city of duels where people from every plane and dimension come to fight.
